channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: Plant pots are jazzed up at the allotment. At the home build, Shreya and Rakesh redesign a shrine. And a washing machine drum is reimagined as a fire pit and BBQ.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team faces a WWII-style government inspection. 4/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Martin Compston's Scottish Fling
channel.desc: Martin Compston and Phil MacHugh travel up the west coast of Scotland on an adventure to discover the different ways people experience the great Scottish outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Bristol to create a Mediterranean-inspired space that will rekindle happy holiday memories for young couple Emily and Maurice.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Liverpool to design a garden for ski-mad couple David and Michelle and their children.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Alice explores the flourishing world of sex and wellness, from a full-body orgasm workshop to an intimate yoni massage . Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Permissive
channel.desc: Bad girls don't come to London, they're made in London. Suzy, a young country girl, is led astray by the wild members of a rock group. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Great British Dog Walks
channel.desc: Phil takes in the beauty of the Lake District with SAS hero Billy Billingham, as Billy shares his life story, from knife fights on the streets to serving on battlefields.
